sense.def: Pathological Condition of severe free-flux illness or free-flux illness lasting for an extended period of time. SWBJQYBMJ Middle juan Recipe Entry jiao zhu wan 椒术丸 , pills with [ shu ] jiao and [ cang ] z hu : 惡痢久不愈者，加桂 , “For malign free-flux illness that fails to be healed for a long time, add gui ”. E lu 惡露 , malign dew [16]

①Blood or turbid liquid (i.e. lochia) leaving from the birth canal after parturition. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 8: Yao zi yi wu fang 藥子一物方 , “the one-ingredient recipe with yao zi ”: 婦人難產後，腹中絞痛，及惡露不止 , “For women who following a difficult delivery have a twisting pain in their abdomen and an unending outflow of malign dew ”.
②Turbid liquid. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29: 又療（諸瘡）若已中水及惡露、風寒，腫痛方 , “A recipe to cure swelling and pain [of all types of sores] if they have been affected by water or malign dew , and wind cold”.
